document_data.mainbody:
hol Morand was a person believed to be able to challenge the Obarskyr royal family for the Crown of Cormyr in the late 15 century DR.
In Mirtul of the , while preparing to sneak into the Haunted Wing of Castle Obarskyr, of Suzail, Marlin Stormserpent briefed the retinue hed hired for the task by claiming, amongst other things, that the haunted wing held people whod become a threat for their ability to challenge the Crown. When asked about Thol Morand, he claimed that one, among others, was there.
